content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Inserter Production Line at position(23.5, 2.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position 23.5, 2.5) for crafting inserters
- Input burner inserter (position 21.5, 2.5) 
- Output burner inserter (position 25.5, 2.5)
- Input wooden chest (position 20.5, 2.5) containing 229 inserters and 1 iron plate
- Output wooden chest (position 26.5, 2.5)

###Iron Smelting Area
Multiple furnaces for smelting iron:
- Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position(2.0, 0.0) 
- Furnace at position(4.0, 4.0) with 5 coal fuel
- Furnace at position(6.0, 4.0)

###Power Generation System
Steam power setup consisting of:
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5) extracting water
- Boiler (position -2.5, 24.0) converting water to steam
- Steam engine (position 4.5, 24.5) generating electricity
- Connected pipe networks for water (fluid system 34803) and steam (fluid system 34804)
- Electric pole network (ID 116652) distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with crafting recipes requiring machines
- When crafting items like electronic circuits that require assembling machines or furnaces, ensure you have the proper production setup rather than trying to hand-craft

### Errors with fuel management
- Monitor boiler fuel levels consistently
- Keep coal readily available in inventory before attempting to refuel boilers
- Add fuel before boiler completely runs out to maintain steady power generation

### Errors with assembler ingredient shortages
- Ensure all required ingredients (iron plate, iron gear wheel, electronic circuit) are available before starting assembly
- Maintain proper supply chains for all components
- Monitor assembler warnings for missing resources

### Power system errors
- Keep power system properly connected and fueled to avoid "no power" warnings
- Maintain steam and water flow through proper pipe connections
- Monitor boiler-steam engine connections

### Resource management
- Keep track of inventory levels for critical materials
- Ensure proper resource flow between storage, furnaces and assemblers
- Maintain adequate coal supply for both power and inserter operation
